programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: On a hot summer day, Berry, Dolly, Bubble and Balthazar put on their swimsuits, looked for their buckets, shovels and started to build the loveliest sand castle on the Sand Island.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: On a sunny autumn day, Berry and Dolly went into to forest to pick blueberries. Flutter, the butterfly girl, and Eddy, the potato beetle joined them as well. When Eddy saw the fruitful bushes can’t help but pick all the best fruits before the others. What’s left to do?

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: It’s December, and it’s gingerbread time! Berry and Dolly love making them. Berry’s house filled with the wonderful smell of the biscuits what the magpie immediately noticed from above. Grabbed the bowl and flew away with it. Oh my!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing discovers a hole in his favourite yellow wellies but he doesnt want to throw them away in the stinky dustbin.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop hear the familiar jingle of Gillys ice cream van and race across the park to find her. After a long run Bing finally gets his ice cream but as he waves goodbye to Gilly he tips the ice cream out of the cone.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: In the absence of a real plaster, Bing makes one out of sticky tape, but it’s so sticky that it hurts when he tries to take it off.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing loves Arlo the cat. They are friends. Bing strokes the kitty and they play hide and seek, but what happens when Bing meets a cat that isnt as friendly?

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda is expecting Rupert to breakfast, but the hedgehog doesnt turn up. So Tilda goes to Ruperts house, where Edna tells her that Rupert has gone into the village. The mouse finds it odd that Rupert has forgotten their arrangement and sets off after him.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda wants to open a hotel so that people from far afield can spend time in beautiful Wild Rose Lane. Rupert thinks its a bad idea, but Tilda sticks to her guns. Then the first guests arrive at Hotel Appleseed, a frog and his son. But instead of being quiet and polite, the guests turn Tildas house on its head. Soon she is rushed off her feet with work.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: One day, a mouse called Ferdinand Pearstalk turns up on Tildas doorstep and announces that he will be taking over her house: the vicar has swapped churches and with him the church mouse. To Tildas amazement, he immediately moves in. With a heavy heart, Tilda puts all her stuff on a handcart and trundles off.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: When Little Nutbrown Hare sees Blue Bird building a nest, he thinks it looks like fun, so he and Little Field Mouse build one themselves. But its a bit too scratchy and tickly for them to get comfortable in. They give it to their friends to try out, but they also find it not quite right. Will anybody find their nest cozy and useful?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Big Nutbrown Hare teaches Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends to play hide-and-seek, but the boisterous little hare finds it hard to stay still and quiet, especially when the Spring meadow is full of birds, butterflies and lizards to chase. When he does manage to stay still and quiet he finds the creatures of the meadow come to him… even very shy ones.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare finds a very special feather with bright colours, spots and soft tickly bits. Just as he shows off to his friends how it can fly and float, a cheeky bird flies away with it. Little Grey Squirrel climbs her tree and discovers the bird using it to feather her nest. Will Little Nutbrown Hare find a way to get his feather back, or will he decide that the bird needs it more than he does?

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Grandma tells the tale of the legendary Popolino to motivate Simon on their hike through the mountains. Will they see the legendary creature when they reach the lake?

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A common tree frog hops into the garden one wet and rainy day. Leo, Katie and Hero take the frog to the forest, where Ranger Rocky directs them to find the frog’s breeding ground.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: The trainees have to remember three destinations and visit them in the right order. Wilson and Koko make fun of Brewster when he makes up a rhyme to help him remember – but when they get stuck halfway through the test, they discover that his rhyme really works! They remember where they’re going, and all three trainees earn their badges.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn his badge, Brewster has to stay clean while pulling a very messy load. It all goes wrong and he gets filthy – and the chugwash is broken! Koko comes to his rescue by suggesting that he washes himself clean in the Storm Maker. He cleans himself up, delivers his load – and earns his badge!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: After having to stay indoors during a summer shower, Tchoupi and Nina are happy to be able to go back outside and play. Naturally, with rain comes snails. But unfortunately, T’choupi accidentally drops one, denting its shell. There’s no way he’s going to just walk away and leave it to its fate! So Dad advises the kids on how to take care of the gastropod… not an easy feat, when all it wants to do is run away...!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi and Nina are playing in the cottage when a big boom startles them. Running out onto the terrace, they find a stunned sparrow: it’s obvious the small bird flew into the window and has gotten a big bump from the collision! Dad insists the animal needs peace and quiet in order to recover. T’choupi and Nina set themselves the mission of tending to the wounded bird. But disruptions in the cottage, such as a fleeing goat and a chasing cat, make their task way more difficult than expected! Will T’choupi and Nina manage to help the sparrow fly again?

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi spots a baby rabbit at the edge of the garden. Taking pity on this lone animal, he decides he wants to keep it. So he introduces it to Plume and Plumeau, hoping they’ll all play together. But despite his good intentions, T’choupi realizes before long that you can’t just invite any random guest into your home…

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Today, its sports day! Charley is enthusiastic. Especially when faced with a brand new obstacle: a rock-climbing wall! But over-confident, Charley slips and almost falls... Hes now panicking at the thought of climbing again. That evening at home, Mamie, touched by his plight, lends him a precious pebble that makes him strong! All it takes to help Charley regain his self-confidence.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia have been given a great number of cheese star by Mrs Brioche. But Tony and Ella think they should share it with them. M. Grumpy decide to organize a game to bring peace back.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Duck gets stuck on some flooded track, James is sent to fetch Rocky to rescue him. But James doesn’t wait for Rocky to secure his crane arm and they end up knocking down a signal before they arrive at the accident site. Without a signal to warn them, the other engines don’t stop, and what began as one small accident for Duck soon escalates into a much bigger one involving several other engines!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: James hears Duck talking about the slip coaches they used on the Great Western Railway, which could be uncoupled at stations without stopping, and presents it to the Fat Controller as his idea - but he soon runs into trouble.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou and his family visit the botanical gardens, and Caillou uses his listening skills to get through a maze!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou has fun at Rosies birthday party playing games and giving her a special birthday present!

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The kids find some numbered papers blowing around the park. After investigating several possibilities of where they could be from, they finally figure out they were once fastened to trees in the park as part of a self-guided tour to celebrate Arbor Day. / When all the milk in Huckle’s Dad’s store turns out to be sour, Huckle, Sally and Lowly set out to find out why.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Everyone knows what happens when a bull sees red, but do you know what happens when he sees red flowers? Ask Monkey, his friend the bull came to visit just as he was picking beautiful red flowers at the farm, do you know what happened? They ended up playing Monkey’s favorite game… “Monkey See Monkey Do”!

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey is hungry, oh so hungry, but he cannot find anything to eat, when all of a sudden, a nut falls from above followed by another and another…it is Squirrel, his good friend! Seeing how fast Squirrel moves around, Monkey is inspired to play his favorite game… “Monkey See Monkey Do”!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When Norman and new boy Peter get lost at sea, Krystyna must pilot the new rescue plane and save them before their ship sinks!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Peter fixes Joe’s giant kite and gets it off the ground… unfortunately he also gets his feet tangled up in the string and is pulled into the air!

programme.title: Franklin And Friends
programme.desc: Franklin wants to play exactly the same acorn obstacle course game that he and Bear played at last year’s picnic, but Bear would rather look for bugs with his new bug identifier book. Franklin is upset his plan is ruined – until he realizes it’s okay if the picnic is not exactly the same as last year’s. They look for bugs and do the obstacle course - and have a blast! / Franklin borrows Dad’s lucky pen - without asking permission first – to help the Super Cluepers solve their latest case: Franklin’s missing baseball cap. But when the culprit turns out to be Harriet who took the cap to be more like her big brother, Franklin learns, firsthand, the importance of asking permission when you want to borrow something.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie has agreed to lend her colored paint to Woodsy, so that he can paint a coat of arms on a pretty bark. But when she finds out that during her absence Scoutbadger has also borrowed some of her paint and emptied all the colors, she’s very unhappy! Fortunately, the twins have set about a quest to make it up to her…

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky would like to get engaged with Bubble when he becomes a great prince! Doodleboo has a little idea of Riddleboo that would be the perfect engagement gift that Sketcky could offer to Bubble!

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky invented a song for the islands great singing competition that evening! But he needs a musician to accompany him and has not found anyone... Doodleboo will help him, thanks to a Riddleboo! And he is sure that what his friend needs is a very good castanets player!

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky would like to organize a football tournament but he does not know how to do it... Doodleboo surely has an idea of Riddleboo to help him.

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: It’s Super-Tweet to the rescue to save some friends in need! But by the time Tweet’s sung her super chant and performed her special dance to make her feel ‘super’ enough, her helpers Ruff-Ruff and Dave have already saved the day! It’s only when Tweet stops worrying and flies to the rescue of Littlest Bunny that she gets to show just how Super she really is!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave search for eight different sounding bells to help Dave ‘ring’ and ‘sing’ his special friendship song: “Dave’s best friends are Ruff-Ruff and Tweet. Bananas are yummy to eat!” They listen carefully to the sounds of big and small bells and work out the correct order to play them in to match the rising and falling scale of Dave’s song.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: A Summer storm sweeps across the valley and a nervous Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends scamper into a cave with Big Nutbrown Hare. They are all safe and dry in the cave, but the thunder outside is still scary. Big Nutbrown Hare explains that noises can’t hurt you… but will he help them overcome their fears enough to enjoy the storm and the wonders of nature that it brings?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: A lazy Summer’s day brings a wonderful discovery for Little Nutbrown Hare… a tree full of bright, beautiful, tasty plums! Little Nutbrown Hare isn’t the only one enjoying the juicy summer fruit, it seems like every animal in the meadow has come for a taste. As the Summer goes on the plums disappear and Little Nutbrown Hare begins to wonder what all the animals will do without them.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare awakes to find the leaves changing colour and falling off the trees, the flowers dropping off the bushes and the tadpoles turning into frogs. Autumn is here and it’s time for change! Little Nutbrown Hare misses the joys of the Summer meadow. Will he discover that Autumn has it’s own delights?

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When the children make Eggy heads with eggs and cress seeds, Bing gets impatient and wants his cress to grow quicker so he decides to give Eggy lots of water with the garden hose.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The bunny gets jealous when Sula gives Pando more attention on a playdate. He tries to gain some for himself and ends up being pushed, so Amma show them how to get rid of the anger

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Nuair a tha Bing a’ cluich geama le fòn-làimhe Flop, chaneil rudan a’ dol mar bu chòir oir tha am fòn-làimhe a briseadh nuair a tha e dol na sgeing air an làr. An àite seo innse do Flop, tha Bing ga chuir dhan bhiona. Tha e faireachdainn cho dona mun seo ach tha e ag ionnsachadh gum feum e innse mar a thachair. When Bing is playing a game with Flop’s mobile phone, he accidentally drops the mobile and it breaks. Instead of telling Flop, he throws it in the bin. He feels upset about it all and learns that it’s best to tell the truth.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and his friends put on a show in the park. After Coco’s dance, Pando’s song and Sula’s acrobatics display everyone is excited to see Bing’s finale. When he gets up on the stage Bing is overcome with stage fright so his friends, and rainbow fairy mice, come to the rescue.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Sula and Amma watch the fireworks at Bings house. Sula doesnt like the loud bangs, so she wears ear mufflers. Bing, on the other hand, thinks he is brave enough to watch the fireworks from the garden. All of a sudden, a very loud bang sends Bing running into the house and hiding under the kitchen table. Flop makes special ear gloves for Bing to enjoy the fireworks show without having to hear the loud bangs.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry wants to perform magic, but Stanley and Balthazar tease him. Berry borrows Katies magic box, learns tricks, and puts on a show for his friends. The tricks amaze the audience, especially when Berry successfully performs real magic by summoning rain.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The little friends decide to get rid of their old, unwanted items and organize a yard sale in the meadow. The old items lead to a lively barter, but a large pile of useless junk remains. The rubbishtruck of the quick beetles arrives to help, taking away the remaining items and assisting in cleaning the meadow.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Bubble catches a cold, and Dr. Owl suggests drinking elderflower tea. Flutter sets out to gather elderflowers and meets Harmony, the glass-winged butterfly. Harmony teaches Flutter how to make the tea properly. Thanks to the delicious drink, Bubble soon recovers, and they celebrate spring with their new friend Harmony over a tasty elderflower syrup.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Alfonso, the cricket, finds a strange little fish in the stream, which turns out to be a lost polliwog. Although Alfonso is sad when the polliwog returns to its frog family, their friendship doesnt end. Alfonso visits his tadpole friend every day, who soon develops into a real little frog.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: When Huckle, Lowly and Sally find a lost bag, they use the eyeglass case, atomizer, map, and a red scarf inside it to determine that the owner is a famous international opera star who’s come to Busytown to perform for the first time./Cyclists getting flat tires somewhere in Busytown lead Huckle and the gang on a mystery.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey is sliding up and down on the Jungle Jims new slide. He invites Parrot to come join him but apparently Parrot is afraid of sliding. Mole appears and tells them how the otters love sliding down to the water and they decide to fly to the lake to meet Otter... when they get there they watch how a first a bit stressed baby Otter learns how to swim.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: As Norman leaves the house, the giant hat he made for the Pontypandy Hat Parade gets stuck in the door, just as the sitting room goes up in flames!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Norman films a glimpse of the Pontypandyness Monster using Joe Sparkes Submaster 2000, sparking Monster Mania in Pontypandy.

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate’s family trip to the zoo is canceled when it starts raining. In Mimiloo, Kate and Mim-Mim help their pals make their own zoo animals out of bushes and hedges. But after a spritz, the animals come alive, and things quickly get a little too wild!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate needs to find four purple buttons for plushy Mim-Mim’s new sweater, but there are so many to look through, it’s going to take a long time. In Mimiloo, Gobble uses Tack’s Copy-Zapper to duplicate popper peach trees so he can make the biggest batch of popper peach jam ever. But things get messy when Boomer duplicates himself!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi gets a surprise when he finds out there’s a second donkey in the hamlet - a female donkey by the name of Cuddles. He and she hit it off immediately, so when Benedicte suggests they take the two donkeys for a walk in the forest, T’choupi and Nina are overjoyed! Only problem is, T’choupi pampers Cuddles so much that she keeps refusing to budge throughout the whole walk: she’d rather stop and chew on the “treats” along the way!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi is feeling a bit grumpy. He’s even refusing to play with Nina: our little hero is missing his grandparents and friends back home. But Mom reassures him: it’s normal to sometimes feel a little down when you’re away your loved - ones. To cheer him up, Dad suggests they make changes to the cottage, to remind him of his house back home, and his family! Tchoupi suddenly switches from feeling sad to feeling ecstatic! He’s eager to invite Nina to celebrate this happy day with him… but can’t find her anywhere! This gets him worrying: what if his friend took off because of how unkind he was to her this morning?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda has invited her friends for Christmas, but a heavy snowfall prevents them from arriving. Luckily, Gertrude the mole digs a tunnel to Tilda’s house, ensuring the party can take place!

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Its Grandfathers birthday! The Triplets want to give him an amazing present, Girl wants to offer him a rake for his garden, Poet a big hat and Turbulent wants to bought a race car. Unfortunately and despite their willingness, the Triplets dont have enough money! On Mommys good advice, they decide to team up to buy Grandfather the most amazing gift. Their choice goes for a beautiful tie which they buy and wrap up. Everything is ready for Grandfathers birthday, but thats without counting on Totos appetite.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: At dinnertime, Mommy announces to the Triplets there is a new neighbor in the building. She asks them to go welcoming her and invite her for coffee. However, Madam Gzell, the neighbor, is absolutely not a nice person. She welcomes the Triplets really harshly, all she worries about is her sick baby. When they learn there is a new baby in the building, all the Triplets want, its to play with him. But Madam Gzell is really mysterious, no one can see her baby! The investigation is on !

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Today, everybody seems to be squabbling: Edmund and Margaret, Biva and Rosie, Scoutbadger and Woodsy! Nothing serious really, if you apologize. But as Scoutbadger and Woodsy obstinately refuse to do so, their fight becomes unbearable for their sister Berry.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou gets his first loose tooth and prepares for a visit from the Tooth Fairy!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Daddy helps Caillou prepare magic tricks for the school talent show!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: The Troublesome Trucks are being particularly cheeky and disobedient. When a new brake van called Bradford arrives from The Mainland Thomas is delighted to work with him as Bradford is excellent at keeping The Troublesome Trucks under control. But Bradford is a real stickler for the rules, and Thomas soon tires of his petty regulations, which are always making him late.. Eventually Thomas is so fed up with Bradford that he decides to go off without a brake van, a reckless and dangerous move, which ends up with Thomas hurtling out of control down Gordon’s Hill with no brake van to stop him.

programme.title: Chuggington 04
programme.desc: Hoot and Toot do a good deed to help Wilson so Vee rewards them with a gold wheel. But they get greedy and want another and go about it all the wrong way.

programme.title: Chuggington 04
programme.desc: Wilson revels in being Frostini’s special helper and is put out when Hoot and Toot get a chance to assist too. Wilson tries to do everything himself with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Today, its sports day! Charley is enthusiastic. Especially when faced with a brand new obstacle: a rock-climbing wall! But over-confident, Charley slips and almost falls... Hes now panicking at the thought of climbing again. That evening at home, Mamie, touched by his plight, lends him a precious pebble that makes him strong! All it takes to help Charley regain his self-confidence.

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave learn different ways to stay safe. Hatty shows them how to be safe when crossing a road, boating and doing construction work. Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave help keep others safe too, when they repair a broken road sign to warn the Sheep about danger on the road up ahead!

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: What animal is as graceful as a dancer ? Doodleboo and Sketchy explain how to draw a Flamingo.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers take a baby smooth-coated otter to the rainforest to find its home. Unfortunately, a group of hungry crocodiles have their eyes on the little otter.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: At the end of summer, the Star Girl visits her friends. She rarely comes because her star-shaped house is in the sky. They spend a day together, and when night falls, the Star Girl bids everyone farewell. She can’t speak, but she plays the harp beautifully. The music will lift her house into the sky. However, this time one of the harp strings comes loose, and the house doesn’t rise. The Wind blows the string out of her hand, and she can’t catch it.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The Centipedes apple tree hasn’t had any fruit for many years. He asks Berry for help, who carefully tends to the tree. At the beginning of summer, apples finally appear, and the Centipede is so happy that he invites his distant relative, the Millipede, for a visit. However, the Millipede falls ill and can’t come. The Centipede then invites his friends to a big apple party. When they arrive, they pretend that the Millipede was there, but it turns out that it was just his friends in costume.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The Cave Spider and the tiny Spiderling are good friends, and one summer day they are walking on the mountaintop. Spiderling blows a dandelion at the Cave Spider, who falls and gets injured. Spiderling immediately seeks help from Doctor Owl, who determines that the Cave Spiders legs are bruised and prescribes two weeks of rest. Berry, Dolly, Stanley, and Balthazar help the Cave Spider get home. Dolly suggests they sew a large canopy so the Cave Spider can watch the ants end-of-summer fireworks from the air. Flutter, Leapy, Zephyr, and the others make the canopy, and on the night of the fireworks, they lift the Cave Spider up so he can enjoy the view from above.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: On a spring day, Alfonso finds an unknown seedling by the stream. The cricket carefully guards the plant, which soon produces a special flower. Alfonso waters and tends to it daily, happily watching it grow. One morning at the end of summer, Alfonso notices that the flower has wilted and its petals have fallen off. Sadly, he gathers the petals and brings them into the house. In the afternoon, Dolly visits him, and later his friends come over to cheer him up. They bring delicious pancakes, but Alfonso is still sad. They go out to the stream, and Alfonso scatters the flower petals into the water, bidding them farewell with tears.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: As the end of summer approaches, the Lightning Beetle visits the fireflies and surprises them with a new book about planets and stars. After a conversation, one little firefly, when the others were already asleep, sets out to conquer the sky, but becomes completely exhausted and crashes. Doctor Owl diagnoses him with a fever and possible pneumonia, so he stays with him to heal. The other fireflies decide to surprise him. With the help of Berry, Dolly, Balthazar, Stanley, Flutter, and Eddy, they make colourful orbs, and the Lightning Beetle crafts the Sun. They suspend the planets on a hoop, which Eddy rotates with a contraption. They also instal tiny lights, resembling stars.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is playing Hide And Seek at the crèche with Sula, Pando and Coco. Bing doesn’t go to the toilet with all the others before the game starts and when he needs to go before he is found he has to decide whether to give up his hiding place or try and hold on.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop are making ginger bunny biscuits for Charlie and Coco.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The series follows a pre-school bunny named Bing as he experiences the world around him. It uses small everyday occurrences to demonstrate how he learns new ways to manage situations with the help of his carer, Flop and friends. The programmes central phrase is Its a Bing thing! which Flop intones at the end of each episode when Bing has successfully conquered a troubling task or enjoyed a new childhood experience.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are having so much fun playing together, they dont want to say goodbye.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When Bing accidentally leaves his Hoppity Voosh toy at the park, Amma helps Bing focus and retrace his steps to find it.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Berrykin Blooms braggart cousin, Berrykin Bertram, has won the hot sauce competition at the local county fair year after year. But this year, Sour and Apple are determined to help the kindhearted Bloom win... whether he wants to or not!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Margaret is teaching orienteering to the children. And to put into practice what they have just learned, she has organized an orienteering course, to be played in teams. Scoutbadger, Rosie and Pico are in the same team, the red one. The badger isn’t happy about being with Pico, whom he believes to be too slow and a little wimpy. Scoutbadger is in it to win it! In his eyes, anorienteering course is a race.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Day It is the shortest day of the year so the sun doesnt rise until very late and is going to set very early. To Little Nutbrown Hare everything feels mixed up and theres no time to do all the things he wants to do. That’s until he and Little Field Mouse name it Topsy-Flopsy Day and decide to make a fun and funny day of it!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: In Winter, Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends try to find an extra special place and extra special food for Feast Day celebrations. When things go awry and nothing seems special at all, they discover that the most important thing is to be able to celebrate with those you love. Theme: celebrating with those you love.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, Dolly, and their friends watch slides and then play a lively game of shadow puppets. They continue the game in front of a rock wall, forming funny shapes. Bubble, the little rose beetle, gets scared by the strange shadows on the wall, thinking a giant monster has moved into the forest. Luckily, Christopher, the canary, helps clarify the misunderstanding. Bubble and Christopher join the fun shadow play.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Julia realizes that, despite her efforts to fit in, she will never share all the memories the children have made living in the Mouse Mansion. Sam will help her overcome this difficulty.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia dream of seeing snow falling in the yard of the Mouse Mansion. They decide to do everything they can to make this happen. But such a thing is not so simple, as they will find out!

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: On the beach, the Triplets are playing with Mommy’s bag, she scolds them nicely and tells them it’s time to go home ! But when she reaches for the keys, they are not here anymore ! They probably fell off the bag when the Triplets were playing with it. They have to find the keys or therwise everyone will have to sleep on the beach tonight - which by the way, sound good to the Triplets. Maybe raking the beach could be useful? Or then metal detectors, which would allow to find all the keys of the beach.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets are watching a movie on television, when Poet starts to ask Mommy How do you make a movie ?, she answers him that you need actors band a director to lead them and make the movie. Poet is very excited, when he’s a grown up, he wants to be a director and make animal documentaries. But his brother and sister do not agree with that, they want Poet to film them doing stunt, in a castle, with Dragons and sleeping beauties. Poor Poet will have to comply with the tantrums of his actors, not easy to do movies.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Rattling rivets! The Spooky Chugger has returned!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: As Norman leaves the house, the giant hat he made for the Pontypandy Hat Parade gets stuck in the door, just as the sitting room goes up in flames!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When Sarah, James and Bronwyn find a wishing well in the woods, they are so busy making wishes that they do not notice that Lion the cat has fallen in! The next day Lion still hasnt turned up, so Sarah and Bronwyn go back to wish for their cats return and hear a miaow, but how can they get Lion out? Once more, its Sam to the rescue.

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate And Mim Mim

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Enchanted by its hopping, Kate captures a grasshopper, but as soon as it’s in the jar, it stands still. In Mimiloo, Kate and Mim-Mim help Lily try to capture some amazing new Mimiloo critters to learn all about them. The mysterious, playful creatures lead them on a wild chase, but when they’re captured, they turn out to be super shy!

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou wants to be like a real rockstar, but his loud tunes keep disturbing his family. He goes into a rockstar fantasy, where he learns that he doesn’t need to play loudly to make an impact, and finds a new way to rock out – by turning his rock song into a lullaby for Rosie.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: At the park to watch a meteor shower, Caillou is surprised to see a new girl, Tina. Suddenly feeling shy, Caillou pretends to be the fearless Dax Turbo Space Captain who makes first contact with the alien, Shyanne (Tina). This helps Caillou overcome his shyness and make a new space-loving friend.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Its the hottest day of the year on Sodor and the sun is causing the tracks to buckle and bend. Dowager Hatt, arrives with a present for the Fat Controller - a white pith helmet to protect him from the sun explaining that white reflects heat. Meanwhile the buckled tracks cause Whiff to lose some rubbish from his trucks and a dropped bottle causes a fire. When Belle and Flynn come to the rescue, Belle is derailed and Flynn must travel on his road wheels to put out the fire. The buckled tracks are finally repaired and Thomas suggests that they paint the new tracks white (like Sir Tophams hat) which will reflect the sun and hopefully stop the tracks buckling again.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: It’s a tough game of hide and seek between the Mimic Octopus and the rangers. After all, it’s the master of disguise...

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Can the Junior Rangers train a timid Caracal to be independent in the wild?

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat and Jess have a special delivery for Mrs Goggins - a Loch Ness Monster locator!

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Micawbers claws need clipping and Pat needs to deliver the claw clippers and Amy the vet.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants to get dizzy on the roundybout so Pando pushes him. Its not long before Bing realises that some dizzy is fun but too much dizzy is not fun at all.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing builds a house out of sofa cushions and Coco decides its perfect for a game of Big Bad Wolf. Bing enjoys being wolfie until hes not allowed into the house he built.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: It’s a hot day and Bing and Flop buy an ice lolly from Gilly the ice cream lady. Before they can eat them a frog hops into Bing’s paddling pool and they go to the rescue. By the time they return to the ice lollies all that’s left are the sticks and a plate of lolly goo.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing gets very enthusiastic when he and Sula paint a mural and his painting starts to drop all over Sulas. Sula is upset until she realises that the painting isnt spoiled, its just different.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing gets stuck when he takes a game of hide-and-seek too far.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald tries to teach Daisy the piano. Daisy is very keen, but it just doesn’t sound the same as when Oswald plays, so they decide that Daisy might be more suited to another instrument. They go to Bingo’s music shop where there are instruments of every kind; flutes, cellos, basses, banjos – you name it Bingo has it. After trying practically every instrument in the shop and becoming increasingly disappointed, Daisy notices Weenie bouncing up and down on some bongo drums. That’s it! Daisy is a natural with the bongos and they all end up playing together in Big Park.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald invites Henry and Daisy round for afternoon tea. Unfortunately, Henry always has three marshmallows with his cocoa and only two are left. Oswald sets off with his umbrella to buy another from Andy’s Candy Store. As he heads back to his apartment, a huge gust of wind whisks him up high into the sky, giving him a bird’s eye view of Big City. After much delay, Oswald eventually arrives home only to find everyone has finished their tea. Henry tells him that from now on he will have his cocoa with only two marshmallows – no more, no less!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Roland’s Gifts is an internet gift shop; Bob, Leo, Scoop, Muck and Lofty are in its huge distrubution warehouse with owner, Roland Sweet. It’s a few days before Christmas and Roland has commissioned Bob and his team to install a hi-tech a robotic picking system, which will pick items off shelving, wrap them and put them into delivery vans via a chute. The system needs to be installed by evening the next day so customers receive their gifts in time for Christmas Day. Scoop and Muck are excited and do ‘robotic’ impressions; Leo claims to be very knowledgeable about robotics. During the installation Leo switches the system on to prove his knowledge to Scoop. Meanwhile an approaching snowstorm has moved the delivery deadline to that very evening.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Team Bob are preparing to dig the foundations for a skyscraper in Spring City’s new business zone and are under pressure from Mayor Madison to get started. She keeps interrupting their work on Bob’s smart-phone. Scoop and Muck set a challenge to see which of them can dig/clear the earth quickest. Interrupted again, Bob calls a halt but the machines get carried away and keep digging. Scoop goes too deep and hits into something hard underground. Bob calls Anish Bose, the archaeologist, who announces the discovery of Roman ruins. The build will have to halt while they excavate the site. Scoop is filled with remorse and horrified to learn that Romans didn’t have machines like him. An interested crowd starts to gather as Anish discovers more artefacts. Mr Bentley arrives for a progress report but rather than being angry at the lack of progress he is excited by the historic discovery.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse see a beautiful rainbow. When it disappears before Big Nutbrown Hare can see it, they recreate it for him with flowers.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Field Mouse and Little Nutbrown Hare’s favourite tree falls over in a summer storm. Theyre sad until they discover the fallen tree provides an exciting new place to explore.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse are inspired to make a spider’s web, but run into all sorts of comic trouble when they do.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Timmy loves driving his new go-kart but he has to drive safely. Help him learn when to stop and when to go.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: When Mr Frumble’s morning newspaper disappears off his front step, Huckle sets out to investigate what happened to it. After a number of other innocuous items ‘disappear’ from across town, Huckle ultimately discovers that the culprits are none other than Pig Will and Pig Won’t. They are enthusiastically taking part in Busytown’s Annual Recycling Drive by picking up anything they see that can be recycled./Huckle, Lowly and Sally happen upon a huge tooth and can’t imagine anyone in all of Busytown big enough to own it.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: Messy finds a grey sticky thing that looks like a net in the corner of his bathroom. But what is it - he goes to Okido to find out! He lands in Zoe and Felix’s garden to find them doing some paper gluing to make a picture. Zoe’s communicator rings and Zam tells her that there’s an emergency at Loopy Bridge and she needs their help! When they arrive they see that there’s a crack in Loopy Bridge! Zam says she could fix it but she’s run out of glue… Felix offers his paper glue to her, but she tells him that it won’t be sticky enough, and she needs a special glue.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: Messy is spinning himself around and around in circles across the sitting room… just for fun of course! He loses balance and topples over. Messy sits up and wonders why his windmill came to a dizzy end? He magically transports himself to Okido to find out! In Okido, Zoe and Felix are practising ballet so Messy bounces in to show off his best monster moves until they’re interrupted by the sound of Zoe’s communicator – its Zim calling! They’re invited to help Zim, Zam and Zoom at Magneto Zone.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Sour teasing Apple escalates into a prank war between the two of them. After the girls feud disrupts the town, they are sentenced in a Berry Bitty City-style trial to camp alone together for a whole weekend. Miraculously, they emerge best buds, and their friends are relieved, until Sours influence on Apple turns her into a mini-Sour, and they have to do a personality makeover on Apple.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry has a cold but gets bored of staying in bed so decides to go and play in Dino world.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: A preschool boy named Harry receives a bucket full of toy dinosaurs. This bucket holds a secret --- by using its power, Harry can travel with his dinosaurs to an amazing land of imagination called Dino World.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Jayden explores a North American beach with a walking stick, encountering seals, and discovering a blind pup. Leo,Katie and Hero are playing Blind Mans Bluff in the Garden before getting a call from Jayden regarding the pup. From the computer, they learn about harbor seals and realize the pup may be lost since the mother is nowhere to be seen on the beach. Leo, Katie and Hero travel to the beach, where confusion arises about the pups behavior. They stumble upon Ranger Rocky who calls Ranger Joey as she clarifies the seal pups natural behavior, and Ranger Rocky suggests the mother might be finding food in the ocean. After the call with Ranger Joey, they can’t seem to find the pup! Concerned about the missing pup and Hero, the group splits up to search and eventually finds Hero playing Blind Man’s Bluff with the seal. Ranger Rocky surprises them as he shows them who he found, the pup’s mother returning from the ocean! Leo concludes the mission accomplished before joining Katie and Hero in another round of Blind Man’s Bluff.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Its Darcy to the rescue when Monty falls down an old mine shaft while working on the new visitors park.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas loses his voice trying to sing opera like his Italian friends, and tries to find a new way to pass on a very important message

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: The film director Ratatino is filming a report on firefighters when he sprains his wrist. Grisu then accepts the mission of being a cameraman in Ratatinos stead. The young dragon is very excited first as he gets to shoot his favorite subject: firefighters at work. But his task soon gets difficult as Ratatinos wanting action, action and more action causes bumping and falling and flame throwing and other comic mishaps. At some point Ratatino gets Grisu so upset that he breathes fire and destroy the cameras memory card. Fortunately theres another one left and Grisu goes film a real rescue at the farm and manages to shoot awesome images

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: When Mr Guellec loses all his wild pineapple seeds in a fire, Grisu decides to go to the jungle with Dr Natureza to get new ones, and thus save Mr Guellecs crop. Once there, Natureza gets attacked by mosquitos and Grisu has to complete the mission all by himself.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: One Autumn day Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse convince Little Grey Squirrel to leave his pile of spotted acorns unattended, so they can all play with the crunchy leaves. While they’re gone Little Redwood Fox discovers the yummy acorns and takes them home. Once she finds out they actually belong Little Grey Squirrel, she has to decide whether to give them back or keep them.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The first snowfall of the Winter blankets the entire meadow, and Little Nutbrown Hare is confused because he can no longer see the bush, the log or his seedpod ball under all the snow! Will Little Nutbrown Hare be able to find his way around the meadow now that all his familiar places are covered under a blanket of fresh white snow?

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Wilson is trying for his Fire Warden badge and is thrilled to be given his own siren. When the fire alarm goes off, he must sound his siren and make sure everybody leaves the area safely. Wilson gets a little carried away practising and doesn’t hear when the real alarm goes off. He is given another chance and this time concentrates and takes his responsibilities very seriously. When the alarm goes off during the night, he is able to evacuate the chuggers from the roundhouses quickly and calmly.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie and Biva have found a superb burrow that Rosie’s father could use when he visits the area. The only problem is that Scoutbadger and Woodsy have also discovered it and Scoutbadger would like to make it into a games room.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Bob and the team are asked to build a set for movie-star Dash Lightning’s new film, Muck thinks that his dreams have come true. Dash Lightning is Mucks’ hero, so he decides that he wants to meet him whilst working at Spring City Studios. But when Muck gets distracted with trying to find his hero, he doesn’t pay attention to any of the jobs he is doing. On racing to meet his hero, Muck clips the set’s backdrop and he doesn’t wait to check the pyrotechnic lights, causing them to fall towards the studio-lighting crane. Just as the director calls action, the set falls apart and the pyrotechnics explode towards the lights, risking a fire.

programme.title: Christian Matras
programme.desc: Christian Matras fær í 1936 starv sum lektari í føroyskum á lærda háskúlanum í Keypmannahavn. Hann og Marianna búsetast nú í Danmark, og fáa tveir synir. Gerandisdagurin gongur við undirvísing og gransking í málsligum heimildum, eisini skrivar hann vísindaligar ritgerðir um mál og bokmentir. Krevjandi vísindaliga arbeiðið leggur meinbogar í vegin fyri skaldskapinum, sama gera stríðsárini, sum tyngja sál og sinni. Christian og Marianna eru mest saman við føroyingum í Danmark, dreymurin er at flyta heim, men ikki fyrr enn Froðskaparsetur Føroya verður sett á stovn, fær Christian tað starv í Føroyum, sum hann í áravís hevði bíðað eftir. Heimkoman eftir mong ár sum útiseti kveikir eisini skaldsliga neistan av nýggjum, men nú stunda pensjonsárini til, og Christian hevur skund at avgreiða alt tað, sum brennir í honum.

programme.title: Ozzy Osbourne - Myrkursins prinsur sigur farvæl
programme.desc: Eftir 25 vill ár í Los Angeles vendir ímyndin av hørðum rokktonleiki Ozzy Osbourne heim til Onglands. Vit fylgja hansara síðstu árum, har hann og konan Sharon leggja ætlanir um tað ultimativa farvælið. Ein rørandi og rá ferð moti tí síðsta farvælinum.Upprunaheiti: Sharon and Ozzy Osbourne: Coming HomeFramleiðsluár: 2025

programme.title: Gekkur
programme.desc: Vit halda 25 ára føðingardag hjá Gekkinum í kvøld. Gekkurin verður frameftir sendur í nýggjum hami og nýggir vinningar eru í fokus. Upphæddirnar á hjolinum hækka, so tað nú ber til at vinna millum 20.000 og 50.000 kronur á hjolinum. Og ein Volvo-bilur fer í annan leypin og ein luksus-cruise til Bahamas við 50.000 kronum í lummapeningi í hin leypin. Stora gekkaupphæddin er í triðja leypinum.Raðspælið verður eisini meira spennandi, tí ein krússapottur við virði á 50.000 kronur fjalir seg aftan fyri eina av lúkunum.

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine
programme.desc: Philippe Etchebest se rend dans le Perigord noir, à Sarlat-la-Caneda en Dordogne, pour tenter d’aider Neetah et Rakesh. Ce couple a repris il y a 2 ans un restaurant self-service qui demande rigueur et professionnalisme. Malheureusement, le chef va vite se rendre compte qu’aujourd’hui, c’est tout le contraire. Profondement touche par cette famille, le chef va chercher ce qui ne va pas dans cet etablissement pour agir vite !

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine
programme.desc: Cest à Muret, à quelques kilomètres de Toulouse, que Martine a passe un veritable appel au secours au chef Philippe Etchebest. Son mari Joël tient un restaurant depuis 11 ans, mais aujourd’hui, à plus de 70 ans, il s’epuise à la tâche. Malgre tous ses efforts, les clients se font de plus en plus rares et Joël ne peut pas se verser de salaire. Le moins que l’on puisse dire, c’est que dans ce restaurant dedie aux produits de la mer et aux poissons, le chef est alle de surprises en surprises...

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver
programme.desc: Julien Courbet va tout tenter pour resoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils specifiques. La parole est donnee à toutes les parties pour que toutes les situations litigieuses trouvent un denouement positif !

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver chez vous
programme.desc: Julien Courbet, entoure davocats et dexperts, tente de resoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils specifiques. Des envoyes speciaux sillonnent les regions, recueillent les temoignages et illustrent les cas en images.

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: La meteo de M6 vous fera decouvrir un lieu en France symbolique du derèglement climatique ou des solutions apparues pour le combattre. Sur place, Gennifer Demey, Cali Morales et Stephanie Duval vous expliqueront les causes de ces perturbations climatiques et leurs consequences sur les paysages, la faune, la flore et les habitants de ces endroits de France concernes par le sujet.

programme.title: Le 1245
programme.desc: Retrouvez toute lactualite de la mi-journee.

programme.title: Scènes de menages
programme.desc: Votre couple vous desole ? Vous vous lamentez de vivre seul ? Scènes de Menages va vous aider à relativiser !

Positif, informatif, depaysant, « Un jour, un doc » met en avant des personnalites et des lieux, tels que vous ne les avez jamais vus.

programme.title: La roue de la fortune
programme.desc: De nombreux candidats vont tenter leur chance pour denicher les mots et expressions caches, tout en esperant decrocher les plus gros gains offerts par la roue. Mais attention, ils devront eviter la redoutable banqueroute et les autres pièges qu’elle reserve. Chaque jour, les participants se donneront à fond pour vivre des moments palpitants et atteindre la finale, où ils pourront remporter jusqu’à 20 000 euros ou un voyage de reve à l’autre bout du monde.

programme.title: La meilleure boulangerie de France
programme.desc: Curieux de decouvrir les talents des boulangers partout en France, Norbert Tarayre chef cuisinier et Bruno Cormerais, Meilleur Ouvrier de France Boulanger, repartent sur les chapeaux de roues et nous embarquent sur les routes à la recherche de la meilleure boulangerie de France ! Un veritable road-trip les attend à la decouverte des coutumes et des traditions de 9 regions : Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Bretagne, Bourgogne-Franche-Comte, Grand Est, Hauts-de-France, Île-de-France, Normandie, Nouvelle-Aquitaine et Provence-Alpes-Côte dAzur. Cette annee, vous allez decouvrir 90 boulangeries ; à lissue du voyage, 9 dentre elles seront selectionnees pour participer à la grande finale nationale et, à la cle, le titre de Meilleure Boulangerie de France 2019 !

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: La meteo de M6 vous fera decouvrir un lieu en France symbolique du derèglement climatique ou des solutions apparues pour le combattre. Sur place, Gennifer Demey, Cali Morales et Stephanie Duval vous expliqueront les causes de ces perturbations climatiques et leurs consequences sur les paysages, la faune, la flore et les habitants de ces endroits de France concernes par le sujet.

programme.title: Un jour, un doc
programme.desc: « Un jour, un doc », le magazine qui vous fait decouvrir des loisirs, metiers et activites extraordinaires de Français, dans lHexagone et à l’etranger. Positif, informatif, depaysant, « Un jour, un doc » met en avant des personnalites et des lieux, tels que vous ne les avez jamais vus.

programme.title: Un jour, un doc
programme.desc: Grands debats de societe, nouvelles tendances, retour sur des evènements marquants et des faits divers hors normes, ou encore recits de vie des people et des tetes couronnees, « Un jour, un doc » propose tous les après-midis une grande variete de documentaires et de sujets qui font vibrer le cœur des Français. Chaque jour, partez à la decouverte d’histoires et de personnages incroyables en France ou à l’etranger.

programme.title: Un jour, un doc
programme.desc: Familles, pouvoir d’achat, evasion... « Un jour, un doc » propose tous les après-midis une grande variete de documentaires et de sujets au cœur des preoccupations des Français. Chaque jour, decouvrez le quotidien de ces personnes qui nous livrent leurs histoires.

programme.title: Pekin express : la route des glaces
programme.desc: La capitale kazakhe, Astana, sera le theâtre de la grande finale. Les deux binômes finalistes s’affronteront dans des courses-poursuites effrenees à travers des missions typiques où un curling strategique et un bain glace dans le fleuve Ishim viendront pimenter la competition. Qui aura la force, la strategie et le courage pour decrocher le titre tant convoite de gagnant de cette edition ?

programme.title: Pekin express : la route des glaces

programme.title: La roue de la fortune celebrites
programme.desc: Éric Antoine va proposer à des celebrites de realiser un vieux reve d’enfant : tourner la roue la plus culte de la television ! Et pour la bonne cause ! Chaque candidat tentera de resoudre les enigmes pour acceder à la finale et recolter un maximum pour son association. Comme les candidats de l’emission quotidienne, les celebrites devront aussi dejouer les faceties de la Roue et eviter les pièges comme la Banqueroute ou l’Échange pour esperer gagner leur partie et se hisser en finale.

programme.title: La roue de la fortune celebrites
programme.desc: Éric Antoine convie de nouveaux invites à vivre un reve denfance : faire tourner la roue la plus mythique du petit ecran... pour soutenir de belles causes ! Chaque personnalite devra faire preuve de logique pour resoudre les enigmes et tenter dacceder à la grande finale. Mais attention : comme dans la version quotidienne, la roue reserve bien des surprises...

programme.title: Bruno Walter | Portrait
programme.desc: The film portrays Bruno Walter (1876-1962), one of the most important conductors of the 20th century. The Italian biographer Michele Selvini speaks about the musician Bruno Walter who formed the musical life of the capitals of Europe and the United States over a period of 60 years. But so far not published film material also shows a different, not so known Bruno Walter as a private man.

programme.title: Mozart: Piano Concerto no. 12 - Vladimir Ashkenazy
programme.desc: The 13-part Mozart on Tour series chronicles the journey of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart across Europe. This broadcast features the first three episodes of this series, taking us to London, Mantua, and Bologna. In the first episode, Vladimir Ashkenazy performs as both soloist and conductor in Mozart’s Piano Concerto No. 12, KV 414, accompanied by the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra. The second episode features soloist Heidrun Holtmann as she performs Mozart’s Piano Concerto No. 1, KV 37, and Piano Concerto No. 4, KV 41. Holtmann is accompanied by the Orchestra della Radiotelevisione della Svizzera, led by Marc Andreae. In the third episode, Andreae and his orchestra return for a performance of Mozarts Piano Concerto No. 5, KV 175, featuring Malcolm Frager as the soloist.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Sommaren har anlant till Alaska, vilket innebar langre dagar och annu langre att gora-listor. Squibb hjalper Curly fixa till hans ruttnande dack innan någon brakar igenom det. Sam sanker sina gaskostnader med lite lokal uppfinningsrikedom. Matt ger sig ut i sin nyrenoverade fiskebåt ”The Gothic” på jakt efter lax, och Oliver och Breanna beger sig till Totem Bay for att återuppvacka lite minnen.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Rom var hjartat som styrde over hela Medelhavet for 2000 år sedan, men mycket av romarrikets historia ar holjd i dunkel. Men nu har marinarkeologer gjort fynd utanfor Siciliens kust som kan forklara hur riket kunde expandera och vaxa sig så stort.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Hur blev Colosseum - en arena for blodiga gladiatorstrider - den storsta symbolen for det romerska riket? Arkeologer vågar sig in i Colosseums ruiner och påborjar gravningar over hela imperiet for att jaga efter ledtrådar. Nar teamen går ner i dolda tunnlar och graver fram sedan lange forsvunna amfiteater i Toscana och Storbritannien, pusslar de ihop den overraskande sanningen om Roms ikoniska Colosseum.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Vid en genomsokning av en farja i Puerto Rico hittar poliser flera resvaskor fyllda med kokain. På JFK-flygplatsen upptacker ett team guldsmycken varda en halv miljon dollar. Senare stoppar granspoliser flera resenarer som forsoker smuggla opioidtabletter over den sodra gransen.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: En hemlig operation av Homeland Security i St. Louis riktar sig mot en verksamhet som sysslar med våldtaktsdroger. I San Ysidro stoppar polisen ett fordon lastat med kokain som forsoker passera gransen, och Beagle Brigade vid Dulles International Airport ar redo att sniffa upp hot mot jordbruket innan de kommer in i landet.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Under 800-talet borjade mayacivilisationen att forsvinna. Denna ”kollaps” ar ytterst omdebatterad. Ny forskning ger ett nytt perspektiv. I Mexiko avslojar upptackten av det forsvunna kungariket Sak Tz’i att mayafolket inte forsvann helt och hållet, och i staden Chichen Itza avslojar ett rituellt manniskooffer i en undervattensgrotta att staden frodades aven under en miljokatastrof.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Killarna tar sig an Mikes Ford Escort RS2000. Efter hans sons olycka, vill Mikes familj återgalda hans osjalviska hangivenhet med Bil SOS behandling.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz tar sig an en 1992 års Saab 900 Turbo. Bilen tillhor tidigare elektronikingenjoren Pravesh, som har fått dålig halsa.

programme.title: Nazisternas megabyggen
programme.desc: Nar USA narmar sig Japan år 1944 borjar japanerna anvanda sig av desperata metoder: sjalvmordspiloter och manniskostyrda supertorpeder.

programme.title: Nazisternas megabyggen
programme.desc: Det ar juni 1940 och nazisterna har erovrat Kanaloarna, dar Hitler låter uppfora några av Tredje rikets starkaste befastningar.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Pompeji var en blomstrande stad på Italiens sydkust, tills den fick ett plotsligt slut år 79 e.Kr. Den narliggande vulkanen Vesuvius fick ett utbrott och begravde staden i miljontals ton aska och bråte. Nu graver gravmaskiner for att avsloja den morka sidan av denna idylliska romerska stad genom att avsloja en forslavad persons rum.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Israddarna får standigt svåra fall att jobba med. I norr skickas den nye bogseraren Ole Henrik ut av sin far på ett stort solouppdrag. I soder åker Thord ut for att radda en snickeribil, bara for att upptacka att han kommit oforberedd.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: I takt med att vintern starker sitt grepp måste de sjalvstandighetstorstande invånarna i Port Protection samarbeta for att hålla samhallet levande.

programme.title: Herods Lost Tomb
programme.desc: Dokumentar som avslojar en dold sida av den tyranniska kungen Herodes – han var också ett arkitektoniskt geni som byggde Jerusalems Andra Tempel.

programme.title: Explorer - Heliga gravens kyrka
programme.desc: Varldens framsta experter anvander sig av de senaste vetenskapliga metoderna for att avsloja hemligheterna bakom Jesus heliga grav.

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: Bara Frank Geibs snabbtankthet raddade Northwest Airlines Flight 85 från en katastrof 2002. Vad var det som gick snett?

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: Några minuter efter starten exploderade Trans World Airlines flight 800. Det blev inledningen på en av de svåraste utredningarna någonsin.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar en lastbilschauffor blir stående på isen, men vagrar ta emot hjalp från Thord, skapar han kaos på vagen. I norr holl ett sandningsfordon på att sakra vagen nar det också råkade ut for isen. Jo Rogers ar hårt pressad att dra upp sandaren ur diket och få den tillbaka på vagarna, men riskerar att krossa chassit mot vagkanten.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord forsoker bogsera bort en bil som kraschat 60 meter ner på ett falt efter en snostorm, men blir stressad nar ett vinschfel hotar raddningen. I norr undviker en lastbilschauffor en frontalkrock genom att styra lastbilen och slapet av vagen och ner i hårdpackad sno. Raido tar over raddningsarbetet, men vad han an gor ar det aldrig tillrackligt.

programme.title: Bob Ballard Special: Titanics hemlighet
programme.desc: Det var det mest storslagna skeppet som någonsin byggts och dess ode ar ett mysterium. På vilket satt ar vrakets upptackt kopplat till det kalla krigets morkaste dagar.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord måste testa sin nya lastbil med roterande kran nar en traktor kraschar nedfor en backe och hamnar på taket. I norr ar Raido på vag att barga en skolbuss som har kort ner i ett dike, men han blir forsenad av två andra raddningsuppdrag. Bilentusiasten Bjorn får ett mote med en elbil.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar två lastbilar kolliderar i en snostorm behover Thord hela sitt team och stod från Bjoern for att roja lastbilarna och oppna vagen igen. Sedan kommer ett nytt samtal från tonåringar som har kort i diket, så Thord måste skicka sin dotter Malin och hennes pojkvan Domenic till undsattning. I norr får Jo Roger och Raido en chock nar en vinschvajer glider nar de tar sig an en 50-tonnare lastad med stål.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Vi ser vad som gick snett i flyghistoriens varsta luftkollision nar ett kazakhstanskt och ett saudiarabiskt plan krockade.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Sommaren har anlant till Alaska, vilket innebar langre dagar och annu langre att gora-listor. Squibb hjalper Curly fixa till hans ruttnande dack innan någon brakar igenom det. Sam sanker sina gaskostnader med lite lokal uppfinningsrikedom. Matt ger sig ut i sin nyrenoverade fiskebåt ”The Gothic” på jakt efter lax, och Oliver och Breanna beger sig till Totem Bay for att återuppvacka lite minnen.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Med vintern i antågande samarbetar Sam och Squibb for att bygga en lyft åt Curly, men har problem med att få en enorm stålbit på plats. Veronica råkar ut for ett ovantat bakslag under ett forsok att skorda vintergronsaker. Carl och Morgan återvinner material for att skapa en arbetsflotte, och med bara några få månader att tjana sin årsinkomst ar Jiggys och hustrun Gails laxfiske intensivt.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Hur blev Colosseum - en arena for blodiga gladiatorstrider - den storsta symbolen for det romerska riket? Arkeologer vågar sig in i Colosseums ruiner och påborjar gravningar over hela imperiet for att jaga efter ledtrådar. Nar teamen går ner i dolda tunnlar och graver fram sedan lange forsvunna amfiteater i Toscana och Storbritannien, pusslar de ihop den overraskande sanningen om Roms ikoniska Colosseum.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Under Rom ligger det Gyllene Huset – ett enormt palats byggt under det forsta århundradet e.Kr. Palatset var det mest extravaganta bygget i Roms historia. Varfor begravdes det? Och vad kan dess ode beratta om dess byggherre, Roms mest okande kejsare, Nero? Nar experterna kampar mot klockan for att radda ruinerna avslojar arkeologerna nya ledtrådar om dess ode och dess kopplingar till Neros rykte.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: En hemlig operation av Homeland Security i St. Louis riktar sig mot en verksamhet som sysslar med våldtaktsdroger. I San Ysidro stoppar polisen ett fordon lastat med kokain som forsoker passera gransen, och Beagle Brigade vid Dulles International Airport ar redo att sniffa upp hot mot jordbruket innan de kommer in i landet.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: MIA CBP fokuserar på en passagerare med frekventa besok i Colombia, efter ytterligare forhor misstanker man att han smugglar droger internationellt. Agenterna soker igenom flygplanslaster på jakt efter droger for att hålla sig steget fore kartellerna. På JFK-flygplatsen utfor HSI en kontrollerad leverans av Ecstacy på Wall Street som snappades upp i posten och på LAX forhors två passagerare.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Utredningen av ett mystiskt flygplansvrak i de karibiska vattnen samt upptackten av en hemlig tunnel langs gransen mellan USA och Mexiko avslojar vilka extrema åtgarder som kartellerna ar beredda att ta till for att sakerstalla drogsmugglingen till olika delar av varlden. Har får vi direkt insikt i hur kartellerna bedriver sin ljusskygga verksamhet.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz tar sig an en 1992 års Saab 900 Turbo. Bilen tillhor tidigare elektronikingenjoren Pravesh, som har fått dålig halsa.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz reser till Skottland for att ta sig an en Toyota Supra Mk.4 från 1993 som ags av den fore detta tavlingsmotorcyklisten Lisa, som efter en trafikolycka inte langre kan åka på sina cyklar. Darefter foljde en japansk supercar, men kontinuerliga rorelseproblem har lett till att bilen ar i behov av service. Lisas vanner och familj hoppas att en restaurerad bil ska ge henne ny energi.

programme.title: Nazisternas megabyggen
programme.desc: Det ar juni 1940 och nazisterna har erovrat Kanaloarna, dar Hitler låter uppfora några av Tredje rikets starkaste befastningar.

programme.title: Nazisternas megabyggen
programme.desc: Ruiner i Europa vittnar om blitzkriget, en revolution inom krigsforing som nastan uppfyllde Hitlers drommar om ett tusenårigt rike.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Gladiatorerna fångar fantasin som ingen annan aspekt av det antika Rom. Men vilka var de och vad var hemligheten bakom deras dragningskraft? Teamen klattrar upp for fasaden på Roms beromda Colosseum, dechiffrerar krigarnas gravstenar och graver fram en extraordinar forsvunnen amfiteater i Turkiet, vilket forandrar den populara bilden av vilda och blodtorstiga gladiatorstrider.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: En av Norges storsta exporter ar fisk, och godstrafiken ar en stor inkomstkalla for bargningsmannen. I detta avsnitt måste Thord ringa sin gamla van Bjørn. Tillsammans beger de sig ut for att radda en fisklast. I norr måste Jo Rodger och hans son radda en fisklast på 40 ton som har fastnat.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: I takt med att temperaturen sjunker i Port Protection blir det vitalt att invånarna lyckas trotsa den tuffa miljo som omger dem.

programme.title: Shark Beach With Chris Hemsworth
programme.desc: Chris Hemsworth forsoker hitta vetenskapen bakom hajars beteende och hur dessa djur och manniskor kan samexistera. Efter allt fler hajattacker utan Australiens ostkust, forsoker Hemsworth forstå de olika hajarterna och deras beteende, medan han samtidigt utforskar nya satt och anvander den senaste tekniken for att stoppa fler hajattacker.

programme.title: Chris Hemsworth: A Road Trip to Remember
programme.desc: I sin mest personliga dokumentar hittills riktar Chris kameran mot sin familj efter pappans Alzheimerdiagnos. De ger sig ut på en resa in i det forflutna for att utforska vetenskapen bakom sociala band och hur de kan starka minnet. De återbesoker betydelsefulla platser och ansikten, fångar allt som en hemvideo och återupplivar kara minnen.

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: Några minuter efter starten exploderade Trans World Airlines flight 800. Det blev inledningen på en av de svåraste utredningarna någonsin.

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: Air Crash Investigation undersoker den senaste tidens hogprofilerade luftkatastrofer for att avsloja hur och varfor de hande.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord forsoker bogsera bort en bil som kraschat 60 meter ner på ett falt efter en snostorm, men blir stressad nar ett vinschfel hotar raddningen. I norr undviker en lastbilschauffor en frontalkrock genom att styra lastbilen och slapet av vagen och ner i hårdpackad sno. Raido tar over raddningsarbetet, men vad han an gor ar det aldrig tillrackligt.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar Thord och Bjorn raddar en lastbil som hotar att tippa kryper Thord under slapet under dragningen och lagger sitt liv i Bjorns hander. I norr glider en snoplog av vagen på blankis. Jo Roger beger sig ut for att radda den, men får dubbla problem nar en andra lastbil kraschar på samma stalle och landar rakt ovanpå snoplogen.

programme.title: Expedition Everest
programme.desc: Under en banbrytande expedition till Mount Everest undersoker en samling klimatforskare vad varldens hogsta berg kan beratta for oss.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Kusterosionen blottlagger skelettrester och avslojar det hemsokande forflutna i medeltida flytande fangelser. En speciell typ av spindel upptacks på en isolerad o. Arkeologer upptacker bevis som kan peka på de forsvunna Roanoke-bosattarnas ode. Tusentals doda salar hittas med markliga korkskruvsformade sår i Kanada, vilket forbryllar experterna.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Vi fordjupar oss i den skrammande historien om en kvinnas skelett med en kniv i magen och en sten runt halsen som hittades på en odokumenterad polsk kyrkogård. Darefter avslojar vi ett overvakningsverktyg från kalla kriget som utvecklades av USA och som kanske eller kanske inte forhindrade en karnkraftskatastrof. Slutligen utforskar vi en massiv tramaskin från 1800-talet som byggdes for att dekryptera hemliga meddelanden i Shakespeares pjaser.

programme.title: Europas blodiga historia
programme.desc: Tudorhistorikern dr Suzannah Lipscomb och journalisten Joe Crowley beger sig in i de morka konsternas varld och undersoker du kusliga berattelserna om Europas dodgravare, haxor och getryttare. Forst undersoker man dodgravarna i en stad vid namn Frankenstein, som kan har orsakat (eller inte?) spridandet av pesten med hjalp av pulvriserade lik. Darefter undersoker man den fruktansvarda historien om en aktad kirurg som kan ha varit ledaren for ett djavulsdyrkande gang tjuvar. Till sist åker teamet till Spanien for att undersoka hur en liten baskisk by blev platsen for den storsta haxjakten i Spaniens historia.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Med vintern i antågande samarbetar Sam och Squibb for att bygga en lyft åt Curly, men har problem med att få en enorm stålbit på plats. Veronica råkar ut for ett ovantat bakslag under ett forsok att skorda vintergronsaker. Carl och Morgan återvinner material for att skapa en arbetsflotte, och med bara några få månader att tjana sin årsinkomst ar Jiggys och hustrun Gails laxfiske intensivt.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Sam skickar ned Troy i vattnet på jakt efter skatterna på ett sjunket fartyg. Mary undviker vargar under rådjursjaktens forsta dag for att forsoka kamma hem storvinsten, Curly forsoker fånga halleflundra infor vintern, och Oliver ger sig ut på ett farligt enmansuppdrag i jakt på ved.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Under Rom ligger det Gyllene Huset – ett enormt palats byggt under det forsta århundradet e.Kr. Palatset var det mest extravaganta bygget i Roms historia. Varfor begravdes det? Och vad kan dess ode beratta om dess byggherre, Roms mest okande kejsare, Nero? Nar experterna kampar mot klockan for att radda ruinerna avslojar arkeologerna nya ledtrådar om dess ode och dess kopplingar till Neros rykte.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Hadrianus mur ar den storsta strukturen som romarna någonsin byggt. Den strackte sig 11 mil over Storbritannien och definierade en gång den norra kanten av det storsta imperiet som varlden hade sett. Nu undersoker experter muren, dess fort, porthus och garnisonsstader, for att avsloja hur civilisation och kultur vaxte på Roms vilda grans. Deras overraskande upptackter visar hur livet - och doden - var på imperiets dynamiska och standigt foranderliga kant.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: MIA CBP fokuserar på en passagerare med frekventa besok i Colombia, efter ytterligare forhor misstanker man att han smugglar droger internationellt. Agenterna soker igenom flygplanslaster på jakt efter droger for att hålla sig steget fore kartellerna. På JFK-flygplatsen utfor HSI en kontrollerad leverans av Ecstacy på Wall Street som snappades upp i posten och på LAX forhors två passagerare.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: In Cambodia, the purge of intellectuals under Pol Pot and years of war caused traditional Khmer dishes to vanish from home kitchens. Today, chefs are working to bring them back.

programme.title: FRONTRUNNERS
programme.desc: Wildlife vet Saito Keisuke has worked with endangered raptors in Hokkaido for 30 years. He treats and releases the many birds injured by human activity, while also working to prevent such accidents.

programme.title: Sumopedia

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Mimaki Toshiyuki is co-chair of Nihon Hidankyo, winner of the 2024 Nobel Peace Prize. He talks about surviving the Hiroshima bombing and the groups work to achieve a world without nuclear weapons.

programme.title: IMPACTS: Climates Change the World

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Hip osteoarthritis causes severe pain and may require artificial hip joint surgery. A Japanese university and a company have developed a long-lasting artificial joint, offering hope to many patients.

programme.title: Trailblazers

programme.title: Europa
programme.desc: Norsklæreren Akam lever et komfortabelt liv i Oslo, inntil hans onkel fra Iran kommer på uventet besøk. Til tross for den lille plassen i bokollektivet, føler Akam seg forpliktet til å tilby husrom for et par netter. Den ubeskjedne onkelen tar seg fort til rette, og snart blir det tydelig at han ikke har planer om å reise hjem i nærmeste fremtid. Akam begynner å ane ugler i mosen – er det noe mer bak onkelens spontane besøk? Sannheten kan få uante konsekvenser for dem begge.

programme.desc: Clara får fire utfordringar av den personlege trenaren Thomas. Først må ho førebu seg mentalt. Kor lenge kan ho sitte i eit badekar med is?

programme.desc: Sjølv trur ikkje Clara at ho hadde klart ein maraton. Det blir ein kamp mot kropp og tankar når Thomas ber ho springe i tolv timar.

programme.title: Norske minikonserter

programme.title: Dette er Joan Collins
programme.desc: En av de siste overlevende kvinnelige skuespillerne fra Hollywoods gylne epoke, Joan Collins, står for vitnesbyrdet om en svimlende karriere. Dynastiet-stjernen går gjennom sitt opus og deler sine personlige arkiver i en historie om et ekstraordinært liv i rampelysets glitter og glamour.

programme.title: Parterapi
programme.desc: Kjell-Simen skal feire jul alene, Sara Eline skal være med Alex til Sverige for første gang, og Marie er stressa for at ungene skal pynte treet asymmetrisk.

programme.title: Du klarar meir enn du trur
programme.desc: Clara har vannskrekk og hatar kulde. Likevel skal ho svømme til Öland.

programme.title: Du klarar meir enn du trur
programme.desc: Clara og Thomas vil på toppen av Sveriges høgaste fjell på ski – i snøstorm. Men ingen av dei har stått på ski før, så dei må trene først.

programme.title: Du klarar meir enn du trur
programme.desc: Det er klart for forsøket på å ta seg til toppen av Kebnekaise. Det blåser snøstorm, og problema melder seg snart.

programme.desc: Bitten pusher piller. Kim Rune har en dårlig magefølelse. Matheo kan ikke tro hva andre tror.
